Enterprise developers have asked for more flexibility in how they use Copilot. Many teams already work with specific large language model (LLM) providers and maintain custom models tailored to their…

The post Enterprise bring your own key (BYOK) for GitHub Copilot is now in public preview appeared first on The GitHub Blog.
